memberdef.definition: typedef Traits::Triangle_mesh CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Triangle_mesh
memberdef.name: Triangle_mesh

briefdescription.para: The triangle mesh type which this algorithm acts on.

memberdef.definition: typedef boost::graph_traits<Triangle_mesh> CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Graph_traits
memberdef.name: Graph_traits

briefdescription.para: The BGL graph traits for this triangle mesh.

memberdef.definition: typedef Graph_traits::vertex_descriptor CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::vertex_descriptor
memberdef.name: vertex_descriptor

briefdescription.para: Descriptors for the vertices of Triangle_mesh

memberdef.definition: typedef Graph_traits::halfedge_descriptor CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::halfedge_descriptor
memberdef.name: halfedge_descriptor

briefdescription.para: Descriptors for the halfedges of Triangle_mesh

memberdef.definition: typedef Graph_traits::face_descriptor CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::face_descriptor
memberdef.name: face_descriptor

briefdescription.para: Descriptors of the faces of Triangle_mesh

memberdef.definition: typedef VIM CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Vertex_index_map
memberdef.name: Vertex_index_map

briefdescription.para: The vertex index property map class.

memberdef.definition: typedef HIM CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Halfedge_index_map
memberdef.name: Halfedge_index_map

briefdescription.para: The halfedge index property map class.

memberdef.definition: typedef FIM CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Face_index_map
memberdef.name: Face_index_map

briefdescription.para: The face index property map class.

memberdef.definition: typedef VPM CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Vertex_point_map
memberdef.name: Vertex_point_map

briefdescription.para: The vertex point property map class.

memberdef.definition: typedef Traits::FT CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::FT
memberdef.name: FT

briefdescription.para: The numeric type used by this algorithm.

memberdef.definition: typedef Traits::Point_3 CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Point_3
memberdef.name: Point_3

briefdescription.para: The 3-dimensional point type, which must coincide with the value type of Vertex_point_map.

memberdef.definition: typedef Traits::Barycentric_coordinates CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Barycentric_coordinates
memberdef.name: Barycentric_coordinates

briefdescription.para: An ordered triple which specifies a location inside a triangle as a convex combination of its three vertices.

memberdef.definition: typedef Barycentric_coordinates CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Barycentric_coordinate
memberdef.name: Barycentric_coordinate

memberdef.definition: typedef std::pair<face_descriptor, Barycentric_coordinates> CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Face_location
memberdef.name: Face_location

briefdescription.para: An ordered pair specifying a location on the surface of the Triangle_mesh.

detaileddescription.para:
If tm is the input graph and given the pair (f, bc) such that bc is (w0, w1, w2), the correspondence with the weights in bc and the vertices of the face f is the following:
w0 = source(halfedge(f,tm),tm)
w1 = target(halfedge(f,tm),tm)
w2 = target(next(halfedge(f,tm),tm),tm)

memberdef.definition: typedef std::pair<FT, Source_point_iterator> CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Shortest_path_result
memberdef.name: Shortest_path_result

briefdescription.para: The return type from shortest path distance queries.

detaileddescription.para: Stores the distance to the nearest source point, and a Source_point_iterator to the source point itself.

memberdef.definition: typedef std::list<Face_location> CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Source_point_list
memberdef.name: Source_point_list

memberdef.definition: typedef Source_point_list::iterator CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Source_point_underlying_iterator
memberdef.name: Source_point_underlying_iterator

memberdef.definition: CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Surface_mesh_shortest_path
memberdef.name: Surface_mesh_shortest_path

briefdescription.para: creates a shortest paths object using tm as input.

detaileddescription.para: Equivalent to Surface_mesh_shortest_path(tm, get(boost::vertex_index, tm), get(boost::halfedge_index, tm), get(boost::face_index, tm), get(CGAL::vertex_point, tm), traits).
Internal property maps must be available and initialized.

memberdef.definition: CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::Surface_mesh_shortest_path
memberdef.argsstring: (const Triangle_mesh &tm, Vertex_index_map vertexIndexMap, Halfedge_index_map halfedgeIndexMap, Face_index_map faceIndexMap, Vertex_point_map vertexPointMap, const Traits &traits=Traits())
memberdef.name: Surface_mesh_shortest_path

briefdescription.para: creates a shortest paths object using tm as input.

detaileddescription.para: No copy of the Triangle_mesh is made, only a reference to the tm is held.

parameterdescription.para: The surface mesh to compute shortest paths on. Note that it must be triangulated.
Property map associating an id to each vertex, from 0 to num_vertices(tm) - 1.
Property map associating an id to each halfedge, from 0 to num_halfedges(tm) - 1.
Property map associating an id to each face, from 0 to num_faces(tm) - 1.
Property map used to access the points associated to each vertex of the graph.
Optional instance of the traits class to use.

sectiondef.header: Addition and Removal of Source Points

memberdef.definition: Source_point_iterator CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::add_source_point
memberdef.name: add_source_point

briefdescription.para: adds v as a source for the shortest path queries.

detaileddescription.para: No change to the internal shortest paths data structure occurs until either Surface_mesh_shortest_path::build_sequence_tree() or the first shortest path query is done.

simplesect.para: An iterator to the source point added

memberdef.definition: Source_point_iterator CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::add_source_point
memberdef.name: add_source_point

briefdescription.para: adds a point inside the face f as a source for the shortest path queries.

detaileddescription.para: No change to the internal shortest paths data structure occurs until either Surface_mesh_shortest_path::build_sequence_tree() or the first shortest path query is done.

parameterdescription.para: A face of the input face graph
Barycentric coordinates in face f specifying the source point.

simplesect.para: An iterator to the source point added

memberdef.definition: Source_point_iterator CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::add_source_point
memberdef.name: add_source_point

briefdescription.para: adds a point inside a face as a source for the shortest path queries, equivalent to Surface_mesh_shortest_path::add_source_point(location.first, location.second);

memberdef.definition: Source_point_iterator CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::add_source_points
memberdef.name: add_source_points

briefdescription.para: adds a range of points as sources for the shortest path queries.

detaileddescription.para: No change to the internal shortest paths data structure occurs until either Surface_mesh_shortest_path::build_sequence_tree() or the first shortest path query is done.

parameterdescription.para: A ForwardIterator which dereferences to either Surface_mesh_shortest_path::Face_location, or Surface_mesh_shortest_path::vertex_descriptor.
iterator to the first in the list of source point locations.
iterator to one past the end of the list of source point locations.

simplesect.para: An iterator to the first source point added.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::remove_source_point
memberdef.name: remove_source_point

briefdescription.para: removes a source point for the shortest path queries.

detaileddescription.para: No change to the internal shortest paths data structure occurs until either Surface_mesh_shortest_path::build_sequence_tree() or the first shortest path query is done. Behavior is undefined if the source point it was already removed.

parameterdescription.para: iterator to the source point to be removed

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::remove_all_source_points
memberdef.name: remove_all_source_points

briefdescription.para: removes all source points for the shortest path queries.

detaileddescription.para: No change to the internal shortest paths data structure occurs until either Surface_mesh_shortest_path::build_sequence_tree() or the first shortest path query is done. For a version which deletes all data immediately, use clear() instead.

sectiondef.header: Creation and Destruction of the Shortest Paths Sequence Tree

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::build_sequence_tree
memberdef.name: build_sequence_tree

briefdescription.para: Computes all pending changes to the internal sequence tree.

detaileddescription.para: A call to this method will only trigger a computation only if some change to the set of source points occurred since the last time the sequence tree was computed.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::clear
memberdef.name: clear

briefdescription.para: removes all data, the class is as if it was constructed.

detaileddescription.para: All internal containers are cleared and the internal sequence tree is also cleared. For a version which defers deletion until it is necessary, use Surface_mesh_shortest_path::remove_all_source_points().

memberdef.definition: Source_point_iterator CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::source_points_begin
memberdef.name: source_points_begin

briefdescription.para: returns an iterator to the first source point location

detaileddescription.para: The elements will appear in the order they were inserted to the structure by calls to add_source_point() or add_source_points(). Deleted points will not appear in the sequence.

simplesect.para: An iterator to the first of the stored source points.

memberdef.definition: Source_point_iterator CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::source_points_end
memberdef.name: source_points_end

briefdescription.para: returns an iterator to one past the last source point location

simplesect.para: An iterator to one past-the-end in the list of stored source points.

memberdef.definition: std::size_t CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::number_of_source_points
memberdef.name: number_of_source_points

briefdescription.para: returns the total number of source points used for the shortest path queries.

memberdef.definition: bool CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::changed_since_last_build
memberdef.name: changed_since_last_build

briefdescription.para: determines if the internal sequence tree is valid (already built and no new source point has been added).

simplesect.para: true if the structure needs to be rebuilt, false otherwise

memberdef.definition: Shortest_path_result CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::shortest_distance_to_source_points
memberdef.name: shortest_distance_to_source_points

briefdescription.para: Computes the shortest surface distance from a vertex to any source point.

parameterdescription.para: A vertex of the input face graph

simplesect.para: A pair, containing the distance to the source point, and an iterator to the source point. If no source point was reachable (can occur when the graph is disconnected), the distance will be a negative value and the source point iterator will be equal to source_points_end().

memberdef.definition: Shortest_path_result CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::shortest_distance_to_source_points
memberdef.name: shortest_distance_to_source_points

briefdescription.para: Computes the shortest surface distance from any surface location to any source point.

parameterdescription.para: A face of the input face graph
Barycentric coordinates of the query point on face f

simplesect.para: A pair, containing the distance to the source point, and an iterator to the source point. If no source point was reachable (can occur when the graph is disconnected), the distance will be a negative value and the source point iterator will be equal to source_points_end().

memberdef.definition: Shortest_path_result CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::shortest_path_sequence_to_source_points
memberdef.name: shortest_path_sequence_to_source_points

briefdescription.para: visits the sequence of edges, vertices and faces traversed by the shortest path from a vertex to any source point.

detaileddescription.para: Visits simplices, starting from the query vertex, back to the nearest source point. If no shortest path could be found (for example, the surface is disconnected), then no calls to the visitor will be made (not even for the query vertex).

parameterdescription.para: A vertex of the input face graph
A model of SurfaceMeshShortestPathVisitor to receive the shortest path

simplesect.para: A pair, containing the distance to the source point, and an iterator to the source point. If no source point was reachable (can occur when the graph is disconnected), the distance will be a negative value and the source point iterator will be equal to source_points_end().

memberdef.definition: Shortest_path_result CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::shortest_path_sequence_to_source_points
memberdef.name: shortest_path_sequence_to_source_points

briefdescription.para: visits the sequence of edges, vertices and faces traversed by the shortest path from any surface location to any source point.

detaileddescription.para: Visits simplices, starting from the query point, back to the nearest source point. If no shortest path could be found (for example, the surface is disconnected), then no calls to the visitor will be made (not even for the query point).

parameterdescription.para: A face of the input face graph
Barycentric coordinates of the query point on face f
A model of SurfaceMeshShortestPathVisitor to receive the shortest path

simplesect.para: A pair, containing the distance to the source point, and an iterator to the source point. If no source point was reachable (can occur when the graph is disconnected), the distance will be a negative value and the source point iterator will be equal to source_points_end().

memberdef.definition: Shortest_path_result CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::shortest_path_points_to_source_points
memberdef.name: shortest_path_points_to_source_points

briefdescription.para: Computes the sequence of points in the shortest path along the surface of the input face graph from the given vertex to the closest source point.

parameterdescription.para: A vertex of the input face graph
An OutputIterator to receive the shortest path points as Point_3 objects

simplesect.para: A pair, containing the distance to the source point, and an iterator to the source point. If no source point was reachable (can occur when the graph is disconnected), the distance will be a negative value and the source point iterator will be equal to source_points_end().

memberdef.definition: Shortest_path_result CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::shortest_path_points_to_source_points
memberdef.argsstring: (const face_descriptor f, const Barycentric_coordinates &location, OutputIterator output)
memberdef.name: shortest_path_points_to_source_points

briefdescription.para: Computes the sequence of points in the shortest path along the surface of the input face graph from the given query location to the closest source point.

parameterdescription.para: A face of on the input face graph
The barycentric coordinates of the query point on face f
An OutputIterator to receive the shortest path points as Point_3 objects

simplesect.para: A pair, containing the distance to the source point, and an iterator to the source point. If no source point was reachable (can occur when the graph is disconnected), the distance will be a negative value and the source point iterator will be equal to source_points_end().

memberdef.definition: Point_3 CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::point
memberdef.name: point

briefdescription.para: returns the 3-dimensional coordinates at the barycentric coordinates of the given face.

detaileddescription.para:
The following static overloads are also available:
static Point_3 point(face_descriptor f, Barycentric_coordinates location, const Triangle_mesh& tm, const Traits& traits = Traits())
static Point_3 point(face_descriptor f, Barycentric_coordinates location, const Triangle_mesh& tm, Vertex_point_map vertexPointMap, const Traits& traits = Traits())

parameterdescription.para: A face of on the input face graph
The barycentric coordinates of the query point on face f

memberdef.definition: Point_3 CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::point
memberdef.argsstring: (const halfedge_descriptor edge, const FT t) const
memberdef.name: point

briefdescription.para: returns the 3-dimensional coordinates at the parametric location along the given edge.

detaileddescription.para:
The following static overloads are also available:
static Point_3 point(halfedge_descriptor edge, FT t, const Triangle_mesh& tm, const Traits& traits = Traits())
static Point_3 point(halfedge_descriptor edge, FT t, const Triangle_mesh& tm, Vertex_point_map vertexPointMap, const Traits& traits = Traits())

parameterdescription.para: An edge of the input face graph
The parametric distance along edge of the desired point

memberdef.definition: decltype(auto) CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::point
memberdef.name: point

briefdescription.para: returns the 3-dimensional coordinates of the given vertex.

parameterdescription.para: A vertex of the input face graph

memberdef.definition: Face_location CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::face_location
memberdef.name: face_location

briefdescription.para: returns the location of the given vertex as a Face_location

detaileddescription.para:
The following static overload is also available:
static Face_location face_location(vertex_descriptor vertex, const Triangle_mesh& tm, const Traits& traits = Traits())

parameterdescription.para: A vertex of the input face graph

memberdef.definition: Face_location CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::face_location
memberdef.argsstring: (const halfedge_descriptor he, const FT t) const
memberdef.name: face_location

briefdescription.para: returns a location along the given edge as a Face_location.

detaileddescription.para:
The following static overload is also available:
static Face_location face_location(halfedge_descriptor he, FT t, const Triangle_mesh& tm, const Traits& traits = Traits())

parameterdescription.para: A halfedge of the input face graph
Parametric distance of the desired point along he

memberdef.definition: Face_location CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::locate
memberdef.name: locate

briefdescription.para: returns the nearest face location to the given point.

detaileddescription.para: Note that this will (re-)build an AABB_tree on each call. If you need to call this function more than once, use build_aabb_tree() to cache a copy of the AABB_tree, and use the overloads of this function that accept a reference to an AABB_tree as input.

The following static overload is also available:
static Face_location locate(const Point_3& p, const Triangle_mesh& tm, Vertex_point_map vertexPointMap, const Traits& traits = Traits())

parameterdescription.para: A model of AABBTraits used to define a CGAL AABB_tree.
Point to locate on the input face graph

memberdef.definition: Face_location CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::locate
memberdef.name: locate

briefdescription.para: returns the face location nearest to the given point.

detaileddescription.para:
The following static overload is also available:
static Face_location locate(const Point_3& p, const AABB_tree<AABBTraits>& tree, const Triangle_mesh& tm, Vertex_point_map vertexPointMap, const Traits& traits = Traits())

parameterdescription.para: A model of AABBTraits used to define a CGAL AABB_tree.
Point to locate on the input face graph
A AABB_tree containing the triangular faces of the input surface mesh to perform the point location with

memberdef.definition: Face_location CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::locate
memberdef.name: locate

briefdescription.para: returns the face location along ray nearest to its source point.

detaileddescription.para: Note that this will (re-)build an AABB_tree on each call. If you need to call this function more than once, use build_aabb_tree() to cache a copy of the AABB_tree, and use the overloads of this function that accept a reference to an AABB_tree as input.

The following static overload is also available:
static Face_location locate(const Ray_3& ray, const Triangle_mesh& tm, Vertex_point_map vertexPointMap, const Traits& traits = Traits())

parameterdescription.para: A model of AABBTraits used to define an AABB_tree.
Ray to intersect with the input face graph

memberdef.definition: Face_location CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::locate
memberdef.name: locate

briefdescription.para: returns the face location along ray nearest to its source point.

detaileddescription.para:
The following static overload is also available:
static Face_location locate(const Ray_3& ray, const AABB_tree<AABBTraits>& tree, const Triangle_mesh& tm, Vertex_point_map vertexPointMap, const Traits& traits = Traits())

parameterdescription.para: A model of AABBTraits used to define a CGAL AABB_tree.
Ray to intersect with the input face graph
A AABB_tree containing the triangular faces of the input surface mesh to perform the point location with

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Surface_mesh_shortest_path< Traits, VIM, HIM, FIM, VPM >::build_aabb_tree
memberdef.name: build_aabb_tree

briefdescription.para: creates an AABB_tree suitable for use with locate.

detaileddescription.para:
The following static overload is also available:
static void build_aabb_tree(const Triangle_mesh& tm, AABB_tree<AABBTraits>& outTree)

parameterdescription.para: A model of AABBTraits used to define a CGAL AABB_tree.
Output parameter to store the computed AABB_tree

briefdescription.para: Computes shortest surface paths from one or more source points on a surface mesh.

detaileddescription.para: Uses an optimized variation of Chen and Han's $O(n^2)$ algorithm by Xin and Wang. Refer to those respective papers for the details of the implementation.

Traits
a model of SurfaceMeshShortestPathTraits.
VIM
a model of ReadablePropertyMap with vertex_descriptor as key and unsigned int as value type. The default is boost::property_map<HG, boost::vertex_index_t>::const_type.
HIM
a model of ReadablePropertyMap with halfedge_descriptor as key and unsigned int as value type. The default is boost::property_map<HG, boost::halfedge_index_t>::const_type.
FIM
a model of ReadablePropertyMap with face_descriptor as key and unsigned int as value type. The default is boost::property_map<HG, boost::face_index_t>::const_type.
VPM
a model of ReadablePropertyMap with vertex_descriptor as key and Traits::Point_3 as value type. The default is boost::property_map<HG, CGAL::vertex_point_t>::const_type.
If index property maps are not provided through the constructor of the class, internal property maps must be available and initialized.
